description: This table stores problems received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PROB_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the problem.

columns.name: PROB_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the problem name sent by the external source.

columns.name: PROB_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Diagnosis record identifier that maps to the problem.

columns.name: PROB_DAT_NOT_DT
columns.description: This item stores the problem noted date.

columns.name: PROB_DAT_RSLV_DT
columns.description: This item stores the problem resolved date.

columns.name: PROB_PRIORITY
columns.description: This item stores the priority of the problem.

columns.name: PROB_PRIORITY_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the mapped problem priority category ID.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROB_IS_CHRONIC_YN
columns.description:
This item is set if the problem is chronic.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PROB_STATUS
columns.description: This item stores the problem status.

columns.name: PROB_STATUS_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the mapped problem status category value.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: PROB_SRC_LPL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the source problem.

columns.name: PROB_TYP_OF_CHNG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of change associated with the problem.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Receive


Edit


Delete

columns.name: PROB_SRC_DXR_CSN
columns.description: This item will store the contact serial number of the received document record that owns the instance of this problem.

columns.name: PROB_OVRD_LPL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the record identifier of the local problem that this external problem should be grouped with.

columns.name: PROB_COMMENTS_ID
columns.description: This item stores the identifier of the Notes (HNO) record that stores problem comments.

columns.name: PROB_LAST_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the date and time when the problem was last updated by the external system.

columns.name: PROB_PT_SRC_APP_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this problem is a patient-entered problem (i.e. Received Documents type = 25), this item stores the application which was used to edit the problem for the contact (e.g. MyChart or Welcome). If blank, this is assumed to be MyChart.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


MyChart


Welcome

columns.name: PROB_DT_NOTED_NF_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the nullFlavor value from the effectiveTime low node in a received CDA document.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Information


Invalid


Derived


Other


Negative infinity


Positive infinity


Un-encoded


Masked


Not applicable


Unknown


Asked but unknown


Temporarily unavailable


Not asked


Sufficient quantity


Trace


Not present


User Selected

columns.name: PROB_DT_RESOLV_NF_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the nullFlavor value from the effectiveTime high node in a received CDA document.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PROB_DT_NOTED_NF_C_NAME

columns.name: PROB_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the value from the statusCode node for a problem entry in a received CDA document.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Normal


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: PROB_STATUS_ENTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the value from the status entryRelationship node in a received CDA document. This item itself is not the status of the problem.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Resolved

columns.name: PROB_HIST_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The item indicates whether the problem is current or historic.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current


Historical


Inactive


Discontinued


Deleted

columns.name: PROB_HIST_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date that the historical status for this problem is valid through. After this date, the historical status needs to be rechecked.

columns.name: PROB_SRC_WPR_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the MyChart user who edited the problem for the contact.

columns.name: PROB_EVENT_IDENT
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the event that is associated with a problem. In cases where there are multiple encounters that link to a problem, the earliest encounter is represented here.

columns.name: PROB_DUP_LPL_ID
columns.description: Stores the Problem List ID of an internal problem that is a duplicate of this row in the Received Document.

columns.name: PROB_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number of the encounter that the problem was added on

columns.name: PROB_DX_LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The laterality category ID for the problem.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Side unknown


Left


Right


Bilateral


Never


Possible


Always


Not determined

columns.name: PROB_ANATOMICAL_LOC_CODE
columns.description: The anatomical location code of the problem.

columns.name: PROB_ANATOMICAL_LOC_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The anatomical location display name of the problem.

columns.name: PROB_OVERVIEW_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Note for the overview note of this problem.

columns.name: PROB_COMMENTS_CHECKSUM
columns.description: This item stores the checksum of the Overview note and most recent Assessment and Plan Note along with the creation instant of the most recent Assessment and Plan Note in UTC and the Author's first and last name of the Assessment and Plan note. The format of the data is "checksum C127 instant C127 first C127 last". C127 is character 127. There are no spaces between the data elements.
